title: No network. My phone will not connect to the network after turning airplane mode off.
content: My phone will not connect to the network after turning airplane mode off. It isn't the SIM, as I have replaced the SIM thinking that was the issue. It's not the network settings as I have t changed anything and popped in to the shop to make sure they were correct. I have reset my phone. Please help, there doesn't seem to be a customer support number!!
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
